content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="f of x, equals, e raised to the h of x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a differentiable function. Which of the following is equivalent to the derivative of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> with respect to <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="e raised to the h of x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="e raised to the h prime of x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="h prime of x, times e raised to the h of x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="h of x, times e raised to the h of x, minus 1, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="h prime of x, times e raised to the h of x, power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
